function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in underdeveloped countries in implementing lockdowns","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mandatory usage of face masks and physical distancing without mobility restrictions","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of face masks and 50% social isolation","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of partial isolation measures il < 0.5","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of isolation on wealth loss for a3 agents","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conditional lockdown based on infection curve threshold","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of vertical isolation policy","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact on industry due to inability of a1 agents to generate wealth","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to take action to avoid the increase of infected individuals by the sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flattening the infection curve","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact of mobility restrictions on wealth exchange and economic dynamics","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic interactions between a1 and a3 agents","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of face masks and social isolation measures may not be effective in containing the spread of the covid-19 virus.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible covid-19 spreading due to lack of social isolation","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective control of the disease with low isolation rates","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to implement recommended control strategies , universal mask use and social distancing","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on the mathematical modeling for epidemics and recent papers related to sars-cov-2","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of economic effects of different social-distancing scenarios","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on government enforcement of social isolation measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of global supply chains and production","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpredictable implications of social distancing measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Likelihood of new cases is still higher in large countries than small countries on a per capita basis, indicating a potential risk of disproportionate impact on larger countries.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on travel bans and stay-home orders as primary public health initiatives","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing disease diffusion at small scales due to reliance on mobility restrictions","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased anxiety and panic due to repetitive alerts","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential normalization of mass surveillance in a sustainable smart city scenario","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Pedestrians violating social distancing guidelines","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of the mouse click event for selecting roi may introduce the risk of contamination through shared surfaces.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of pedestrian detection models may lead to increased interaction with potentially infected individuals during data collection.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of shared gpu resources in the google colab environment may pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases through shared computational resources.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential violation of social distancing norms due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of pedestrians","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrusive alerting system","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases if social distancing measures are not effectively monitored","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing through technology","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread if people gather in close proximity to study the schematics together.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing social distancing measures at an early stage of the pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly contagious virus with rapid global spread","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in construction industry due to lack of preventive measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing as a major challenge.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population of diploma and graduate education levels may lead to a higher likelihood of transmission due to increased social interaction","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority agreement on the provision of health and safety rule signage and protective equipment may lead to a false sense of security and reduced vigilance against disease transmission","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of questionnaires and interviews as research tools can increase the risk of disease transmission in the data collection process","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the construction industry","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage of treatment-related information during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy preservation challenges of blockchain technology","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate customization of ledgers for local servers in outbreak areas may limit the effectiveness of blockchain technology in optimizing pandemic response.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of blockchain technology with ethical data standards may compromise user privacy protection and lead to ethical concerns.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on world economy and businesses due to lockdowns and social distancing, with the challenge of time-consuming paper-based loan processes","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"}]}
